sources.description: Title: Hoor on Fire - Hoor dar atash (1991) Directed by: Azizollah Hamidnezhad Date of birth: 21 May 1959, Garmsar, Iran Writing credits: Azizollah Hamidnezhad Music: Kambiz Roshanravan Year: 1991 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Color Runtime: 99 min.
